titleStmt.title: The little world, or, A liuely description of all the partes and properties of man for inuention wittie, for iudgement learned, and for practise necessarie / by Ro. Vn. ...
titleStmt.author: Underwood, Robert, fl. 1605.
Vaughan, Robert, 1592-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Iones, and are to be solde at his shoppe neere Holborne conduit at the signe of the Gun,

notesStmt.note: Caption title: A new anatomie, or, A description of the whole body of man, after an vnwonted manner : no lesse pleasant to the reader, then profitable to the regarder.
Attributed to Underwood by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Erroneously attributed to Robert Vaughan.--Cf. STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Originally published as Underwood's "A new anatomie", 1605.--Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shoppe neere Holborne conduit at the signe of the Gun
